description:
Efficient and delicious fuel you can drink, because there’s not always time to chew. Developed with world class athletes, Skratch Labs newest drink mix delivers 400 calories per servings and replaces the electrolytes lost in sweat, earning the right to be called “Superfuel”.

  • Ingredients: Cluster Dextrin™ (highly-branched cyclic dextrin), fructose, citric acid, sodium citrate, lemon oil, lime oil, lemon juice and lime juice
  • Cluster Dextrin packs more energy than other sugars and releases its glucose gradually, like real food does
  • Electrolyte profile closely mirrors what is lost in sweat, allowing you to recover faster
  • Tested for more than 20 months with top level athletes like gold medalist triathlete Gwen Jorgensen and the EF pro cycling team
name: Skratch Labs Super High Carb Sport Drink Mix Lemon Lime
